CustomField.formula:
IF( DATEVALUE(Date_Submitted__c) = DATEVALUE(Date_Submitted_to_PEOSA__c ),0,
ROUND( 8 * ( ( 5 * FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( Date_Submitted__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD( DATEVALUE( Date_Submitted__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7) + MIN( 1, 24 / 8 * ( MOD( Date_Submitted__c - DATETIMEVALUE( '1900-01-08 16:00:00' ), 1 ) ) ) ) ) - ( 5 * FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( Date_Submitted_to_PEOSA__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE( Date_Submitted_to_PEOSA__c) - DATE( 1996, 1, 1), 7 ) + MIN( 1, 24 / 8 * ( MOD( Date_Submitted_to_PEOSA__c - DATETIMEVALUE( '1900-01-08 16:00:00' ), 1) ) ) ) ) ), 0 ))
CustomField.label: Initial Review Time
